articles.description: Akshay Kumar reacted to R Madhavan's comment about how good films take years to make and can't be made in a few months. Akshay had earlier said he can't work in films that take more than 100 days to shoot.
articles.content: When asked about the comment, Akshay Kumar told the press, Kya kehna chahunga? Bhai meri filmein khatam ho jaati hain main kya karoon? Main is mien thode hi kuchmeri filmein khatam ho jaati hain. (Wh… [+586 chars]
